title: David Bishop Joins FIG Partners As Senior Vice President
content:
SOURCE FIG Partners LLC

Senior Analyst Deepens FIG's Research Team

Dedicated to Community and Independent Banks

ATLANTA 

Bishop, who has 23 years of research and financial services experience, most recently worked for Drexel Hamilton 

"David Bishop 

Prior to Drexel, Bishop worked for MLV & Co. as a Senior Analyst covering commercial banks. He also worked for Stifel Nicolaus as a Senior Equity Analyst, covering banks in the Southeast and Southwest. Earlier in his career, he worked for the National Association of Real Estate Investment Trusts and the American Stock Exchange. Bishop has a Bachelor of Science degree in Finance from Trenton State College 

About FIG Partners

FIG Partners LLC is one of the nation's premier investment banking and research firms specializing in community banks. Founded in 2003, FIG's award-winning research team follows more than 140 bank stocks in the U.S. The firm's investment banking unit has raised more than $2 billion
